title: Astroboy 14
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Manga
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs
description: Three epsiodes of the adventures of the boy robot Astro created by Osamu Tezuka. The titles include: "The Snow leopard"; a deadly layer of snow is feeding on the energy of people and robots, even Astro is endangered; "The Human-faced rock"; Daddy Walrus shows his students a rock with the face of a man. Legend says that if the rock faces the lake, a village will be destroyed; "The Red cat"; five boys disappear while playing around the house of spooky Dr Catapult and his cat; Astro and Daddy Walrus investigate.
